definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Who was your favourite Ninja Turtle?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜歡的忍者神龜是誰？

sentences.english: But didn't you tell him how weird things have gotten with the Turtles?
sentences.chinese: 但是你跟他說了忍者神龜們變的多奇怪了嗎？

sentences.english: I was slowly becoming a real food ninja in the super market.
sentences.chinese: 在超市，我逐漸修煉成了一名真正食物的忍者神龜。

sentences.english: Dan: No, this is the entire contents from my Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle piggy bank.
sentences.chinese: 沒有，這是我儲在忍者神龜錢罐裏的所有積蓄。

sentences.english: This is the entire contents from my teenage mutant ninja turtle piggy bank.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的忍者神龜儲罐裏的所有積蓄。
你最喜歡的忍者神龜是誰？

sentences.english: Do you remember the Ninjie Turtles we watched as kids?
sentences.chinese: 記得我們小時候看的連播卡通《忍者神龜》嗎？

definition: lit. the soul of a deceased has not yet dispersed (idiom)/fig. the influence still lingers on/the spirit (of some doctrine) is still alive
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom)/fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience/to cast pearls before swine/caviar to the general/to preach to deaf ears/to talk over sb's head
